https://tmrev.io/movie/261437-Apocalypse, Man 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Most people were first exposed to Michael C. Ruppert through the 2009 documentary, Collapse, directed by Chris Smith. Apocalypse, Man is an intimate portrait of a man convinced of the imminent collapse of the world, but with answers to how the human spirit can survive the impending apocalypse. Apocalypse, Man
